means: 沉思，冥想( muse的第三人称单数 )
Monitor of Ultraviolet Solar Energy Sensor 紫外线太阳能敏感元件监视器

sentence.Network_en: "As a whole," she muses, "the 'organized church' turns me off"
sentence.Network_cn: 她沉思道：“总的来说，我不喜欢‘制度森严的教会’。”

sentence.Network_en: We have listened too long to the courtly muses of Europe.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧洲那种御用的诗才,我们已经听够了.

sentence.Network_en: Shiki muses that this is, at least, probably the right atmosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 志贵觉得这至少是正确的气氛.

PerfectNetExp.abs: muses the electric energy inside the earth to flow ., 大气的电能引起了地球内部电能的流动.

list.abs: 罗丹美术馆（musee rodin）简介：罗丹在雕塑上的成就受到相当赞誉，与学生卡蜜儿之间的爱情故事更为罗丹美术馆加上几笔浪漫色 …
而罗丹博物馆(Musee Rodin)也很别致, 有屋舍也有花园, 闲逛的好方帖子: 80  性别: 女生感谢: 9次/7帖注册日期: 2008-11-18 帖子.
和科学的九位缪斯(the Muses)，纺人类命运之纱、控制人的生死的命运三女神(the Fates)等。
1999《第六感女神》（The Muse） 　　1999《真爱奇迹》（The Mighty） 　　1998《亡命大煞星》（Gloria） 　　1998《地动天惊》（Sphere…
韩国女子组合九缪斯（Nine Muses）的新专辑《WILD》被韩国Mnet放送审议局判定为19禁，激发了粉丝及网友的强烈好奇心。 据悉…

entry.tran: 沉思;冥想;若有所思地说(或写)
entry.def: If  you muse on something, you think about it, usually saying or writing what you are thinking at the same time.

example.ex: Many of the papers muse on the fate of the President...
example.tran: 很多报纸都在揣测总统的命运。

example.ex: 'As a whole,' she muses, 'the 'organized church' turns me off'...
example.tran: 她沉思道：“总的来说，我不喜欢‘制度森严的教会’。”

entry.tran: (给画家、诗人或音乐家带来灵感的)女神，创作女神
entry.def: A muse is a person, usually a woman, who gives someone, usually a man, a desire to create art, poetry, or music, and gives them ideas for it.

example.ex: Once she was a nude model and muse to French artist Henri Matisse.
example.tran: 她曾是法国画家亨利·马蒂斯的人体模特和灵感女神。

auth_sentence.content: The narrator muses, My dear brother, please stop.

auth_sentence.content: "How to make it conversational," he muses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "How to make it conversational," he muses.

auth_sentence.content: No doubt, their liberated muses would approve.
